Sign up for updates on Whiteheart


The Red Cross of crypto

Hedge contracts to help protect the USD value of ETH and WBTC.

Get USDC and your crypto

If the market goes below your price floor you recieve the different in USDC.

Stake your WHITE

Buy and stake WHITE to get 30% of the fees used to pay for protection on Whiteheart.
